title: My Account is Stuck into a Non Existent Game

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is called a Ghost Game, these usually occur when there are server issues and the game doesn't correctly report as completed.

These usually resolve themselves within a few hours, Judging from the time of your post, this should've been resolved by now.

if you're still experiencing this issue now, please let me know.
Same exact problem, for the last 2hrs now.
